title: Procurement of Oil and Lubricant for the Sri Lanka Transport Board buses
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation, to award the contract for the procurement of Oil and Lubricant for the Sri Lanka Transport Board buses to the M/s. Lanka IOC PLC and M/s. Chevron Lubricant Lanka PLC, in accordance with the recommendation of the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
